Package clientSide.entities

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • clientSide.entities.Student
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Student
extends java.lang.Thread
    Student thread. Used to simulate the Student life cycle. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Nested Class Summary
